what-i-do: I am a Banglore based computer scinece gradute, aspiring full stack developer. I am open for jobs, internships and freelancing
about-me-text: Hi i am Sanketh. I am an undergraduate student at PES University, Banglore. I have 3 years of programming experience. I am about to complete my specialization in Machine Learning and Cybersecurity. I am looking forward for a career in full stack development.
skills-text: I am more focussed towards backend development, moderately good in frontend development. I love to build innovative solutions for challenging problems.

projects.name: Swarmly
projects.description: Swarmly is a decentralized full stack social media application built with Django REST framework and React.

projects.name: Resume Maker
projects.description: Resume maker is a website which allows users to generate good looking resumes based on their input data.

projects.name: Online tic-tac-toe
projects.description: Online multiplayer tic tac toe game built with client-server model. Players from different computers can play with each other.

projects.name: Clustering of News articles
projects.description: This project is about clustering of news articles from a big news data set and summarizing the news in entire dataset by using importaant keywords using big data tools.

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: This is my personal portfolio. You are on the same site
